name: Inner Fire
description: Ignite the fires of hate in an enemy's heart, dealing 1161 Magic Damage and taunting them to attack you for 15 seconds.  A ranged ally targeting the taunted enemy has a 50% chance to activate the Radiate synergy, dealing 2244 Magic Damage to them over 3 seconds then an additional 2249 Magic Damage to them and other nearby enemies.
